last_episode_to_air.name: Theo 100
last_episode_to_air.overview: With diapers piling up in the Templetons' basement, the Boss Baby crafts a plan to break into Baby Corp, kick out his enemies and take his business back.

name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
original_name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
overview: With a little help from his brother and accomplice, Tim, Boss Baby tries to balance family life with his job at Baby Corp headquarters.

episodes.name: Scooter Buskie
episodes.overview: The constantly crying "worst baby in the world" is making life miserable for all of his neighbors.  Can Boss Baby's field team turn things around?

episodes.name: Cat's in the Cradle
episodes.overview: Competition for cuteness heats up when a stray kitten appears on the Templetons' doorstep and the family decides to take him in.

episodes.name: Family Fun Night
episodes.overview: Family Fun NIght turns into Baby Work Night when trouble follows the Templetons to the grand opening of a seemingly purr-fect restaurant.

episodes.name: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery
episodes.overview: Tim's alter ego, space detective Dekker Moonboots, steps in to solve a Baby Corp mystery -- and mounting clues suggest it's an inside job.

episodes.name: Monster Machine
episodes.overview: The Field team enters one of their own in the prestigious Lil' Dumpling Pageant to make sure the winner is someone Baby Corp can trust.

episodes.name: The Constipation Situation
episodes.overview: A backed-up Boss Baby is forced to take a sick day when his system stalls -- and he can't go boom-boom. Now it's up to tim ti take over.

episodes.name: The Boss Babysitter
episodes.overview: The brothers stay home with a babysitter while their parents go out for the night.  Boss Baby wants to make her look bad -- but she's just too good.

episodes.name: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats
episodes.overview: While Tim works overtime to do good in the neighborhood, Staci and Boss Baby go undercover to rescue Jimbo from a house that's crawling with cats.

episodes.name: Spirit Day
episodes.overview: The team suits up to stop Mega FAT CEO Baby from winning an office spirit day contest that's totally rigged.  Because nobody likes a bully.

episodes.name: Par Avion
episodes.overview: A "free" family vacation comes at a cost when Tim's tasked with keeping a plane full of babies calm on an eight-hour flight to Paris.

episodes.name: Cat Cop!
episodes.overview: The Templetons cross paths with a "Cat Cop" with connections to cunning villain Bootsy Calico.  Tim masters the art of negotiation.

episodes.name: Hang in There, Baby
episodes.overview: An after-hours break-in to save Boss Baby's job transforms a do-gooding Tim into the daring Tim Templeton: Unleashed.

episodes.name: Six Well-Placed Kittens
episodes.overview: With Bootsy Calico's plan in full swing, Boss Baby rallies his co-workers to bring Calico and his kittens down and save the town.

episodes.name: As the Diaper Changes
episodes.overview: The new Baby Corp CEO gives Boss Baby a big assignment. Meanwhile, Tim's feisty grandmother moves in, turning the brothers into temporary roommates.

episodes.name: Super Cool Big Kids Inc.
episodes.overview: After declaring war on old people, Boss Baby focuses the field team's efforts on Frederic Estes. Tim starts his own big-kid business.

episodes.name: P.U.
episodes.overview: When Baby Corp's lead scientist accidentally turns the stinkless serum into a stink enhancer, Boss Baby needs Tim's help to freshen things up.

episodes.name: Hush, Little Baby
episodes.overview: An innocent trip to the library for toddler story hour sparks a turf war between babydom and Frederic Estes's Consortium of Ancients.

episodes.name: Night of the Frodarg
episodes.overview: On a dark and stormy night, Tim and Boss Baby set traps for two wildly different threats: a mythical monster and a Puppy Co. agent named Bug the Pug.

episodes.name: Fugitive's Day Out
episodes.overview: After being framed for the Puppy Co. leak, a fugitive Boss Baby goes on the lam and comes face to face with an old corporate rival.

episodes.name: The Passionate Nanny Business
episodes.overview: When Frederic Estes and his friends monopolize Marisol's talents for elder care, Boss Baby and Tim team up to get their babysitter back.

episodes.name: Plushythingy
episodes.overview: The Consortium of Ancients floods the market with an irresistibly fluffy new toy that has babies going gaga -- a little too gaga.

episodes.name: Number One Problem
episodes.overview: Gigi's potty training strategy has a diaperless Boss Baby hanging out in the buff. But a horrified Tim can't handle all the nakey time.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: With the Templeton men away on a "Dudes Weekend," Staci and Jimbo join forces to return a blankie to its rightful owner.

episodes.name: Play It Again, Tim
episodes.overview: Tim's parents enroll him in piano lessons for the rest of the summer. But Boss Baby suspects Tim's "lessons" are part of a larger Frederic Estes plot.

episodes.name: Research & Development
episodes.overview: With Baby Corp's stinkless serum in enemy hands, Turtleneck Superstar CEO Baby issues a challenge to deliver a new formula by 5 p.m.

episodes.name: Wrinkles & Stinkles
episodes.overview: In the wake of Tim's discovery, a newly crowned Boss Baby seizes the chance to show his team what a real leader looks like.

episodes.name: Bossa Nova
episodes.overview: Ousted from the office and desperate for direction, an unemployed Boss Baby joins a mommy/daddy and me playgroup. But he isn't the only new member.

episodes.name: The Museum Job
episodes.overview: A long line at the museum's family bathroom sends baby love into the toilet. Can the field team evict the potty squatter and get things moving?

episodes.name: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist)
episodes.overview: While the Boss Baby helps Tim sell magazines for a school fundraiser, a suspicious baby whisperer is breaking up the playgroup ... but why?

episodes.name: The Coo Chi Coup
episodes.overview: The stage is set for corporate sabotage when Staci sends the Boss Baby undercover to take down Baby Corp's latest leader at a company retreat.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Org Chart!
episodes.overview: Unruly baby Scooter Buskie sends shockwaves through the playgroup org chart — and all of babydom — when he lands the cover of the Bubbeezee catalog.

episodes.name: The Big Break
episodes.overview: A broken bone sends the Boss Baby to a wisecracking doctor who fancies himself a comedian. In other news, Tim's lucky pencil is cursed.

episodes.name: Escape from Krinkle's
episodes.overview: Boss Baby has an interview at Baby Corp — but first, he'll need to break out of a high-tech Bubbeezee playroom. Can the field team help him escape?

episodes.name: Puppy Party
episodes.overview: A party in the park drags the Boss Baby into a dogfight with his old nemesis, Puppy Co.'s Bug the Pug — and the loser must don the "Collar of Shame."

episodes.name: Mega Fat
episodes.overview: A flashback episode reveals everything that happened to Mega Fat between getting fired from Baby Corp and getting adopted by a famous journalist.

episodes.name: Halloween
episodes.overview: Halloween is the perfect cover for the Boss Baby and his costumed field team to sneak into the belly of the beast. But Staci's got plans to stop them.

episodes.name: Who's a Good Baby?
episodes.overview: Baby love has never been higher. But a crash is coming, and the Boss Baby and his crew are determined to bring Bubbeezee down for good.

episodes.name: Yellow 100
episodes.overview: As the newly named CEO, the Boss Baby sets a goal for baby love to hit 100%. But now everyone's working overtime to please him.

episodes.name: Pyg & Tam
episodes.overview: The Boss Baby declares war on a new threat: a popular TV show starring a pygmy goat, a tamandua and their human handler.

episodes.name: Conference Room B
episodes.overview: Company morale is so low that the Boss Baby throws a last-minute cupcake party, then sends a manager to help Tim handle some family business.

episodes.name: Game Plan
episodes.overview: Boss Baby's next scheme to increase baby love? A petition to change the local soccer team's name from the Hive to the Babies.

episodes.name: Night Owls
episodes.overview: After sneaking into a grown-up movie, Tim decides he's mature enough for the adult world. Meanwhile, Boss Baby sleeps over at a friend's house.

episodes.name: OCB
episodes.overview: It's the Boss Baby's worst nightmare when a consultant comes to Baby Corp with zany ideas, then sets his sights on the CEO's job.

episodes.name: Chicago
episodes.overview: On a trip to the Windy City to see Gigi and Grandpa, the Boss Baby comes face to face with an ambitious infant who's masquerading as an adult.

episodes.name: Baby Boss
episodes.overview: The Boss Baby's away at a checkup, so it's up to interim manager Staci to fend off three wars: one from Pyg & Tam, one from OCB and one from Bug the Pug.

episodes.name: Boom Baby
episodes.overview: Boss Baby discovers an old Mega Fat initiative called Project Boom — and it's threatening to ruin baby rights everywhere.

episodes.name: The Fumbling of Football Mike
episodes.overview: After the Boss Baby accidentally sells Tim's favorite toy at a yard sale, he uses company resources to try and get it back.

episodes.name: Teambuilding
episodes.overview: Baby Corp is dismantled and comms are down, but that won't stop the Boss Baby from rallying to reunite his employees. Tim spends one last day with Danny.

episodes.name: Theo 100
episodes.overview: With diapers piling up in the Templetons' basement, the Boss Baby crafts a plan to break into Baby Corp, kick out his enemies and take his business back.
